text: WWE SmackDown vs. Raw 2007 is a professional wrestling video game that was published by THQ. The video game was released for the PlayStation 2, PlayStation Portable and Xbox 360 systems. The video game was released on January 25, 2007 in Japan, November 14, 2006 in North America, November 10, 2006 in Europe and on November 16, 2006 in Australia for the PlayStation 2 & Xbox 360. and the game was released on February 22, 2007 in Japan, December 6, 2006 in North America and on December 15, 2006 in Europe for the PSP. The video game received a 8.1 for both the PS2 and Xbox 360 and a 7.9 for the PSP from GameSpot. It is part of the WWE SmackDown vs. Raw video game series. ==Other websites== *Official WWE SmackDown vs. Raw 2007 website Category:2006 video games Category:Multiplayer and single-player video games Category:PlayStation 2 games Category:PlayStation Portable games Category:Professional wrestling video games Category:THQ games Category:Video games developed in Japan SmackDown vs. Raw 2007 Category:Xbox 360 games Category:Yuke's games
title: WWE SmackDown vs. Raw 2007
